attributes.action: Stop Stuart Attwell from Refereeing the Football League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stuart Attwell has on many occasions this season since his appointment by the F.A. made a real hash of all of the games he has refereed.
We the undersigned would ask you to help our beloved game to rid itself of this type of incompetence that the F.A. seem to want to put upon the football loving nation of the U.K.
Our leisure time is very important to us, and when WE have to pay money to fund it then it should be something we want to enjoy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
